content: There are over a 100 million examples of a bad weight in the USA that YOU will pay for. NOT ME — - I am 76. This is 75% of the entire country; and 50% are obese and the morbidly obese are the FASTEST GROWING GROUP — like the 22 yr old I sat next to and she didn’t care. She has body positivity. In ten years the country will be a vast hospital. How much should you weigh — at 5 feet 100 pounds and for each inch add 5 pounds. The few non fat people lose if their clothes feel tight — that is usually 3 pounds.
